input.sentences: there is nothing like watching a game a fenway park .
there crowd is the best always getting into the game .
we took mom and dad to the game as they had never been .
we had great seats | you could see the whole field .
output.sentences: Watching the game at home is okay, but watching it at the park, live, we were really looking forward to that.
Nothing is like the roar of a raucus crowd on game day!
Mom and Dad and I have been looking forward to this game for weeks.
Our seats were overlooking right field and we could hardly wait.
It was a great day, even if we lost 2/0, and have the organization of our work day to get back to tomorrow.
